question: Trump-Vance Republican ticket on election day?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the final Republican ticket for the 2024 U.S. presidential election consists of Donald Trump and J.D. Vance. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve based on the official Republican nominees for president and vice president as of November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET.

If either of these nominees drop out from the election or otherwise lose the official nomination of their party for the respective presidential and vice presidential roles, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

Note that whether Trump-Vance are on state ballots will have no bearing on this market - only their status as the Republican nominees will be considered. In the event of any extenuating circumstances that prevent either of these candidates from continuing the race, this market will also immediately resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official US governmental sources, and the Republican party (e.g. https://gop.com/, etc.).

question: 50kg W Boxing Final: Wu (CHN) vs. Cakiroglu (TUR)
description:
This is a market on whether Wu Yu (CHN) or Buse Naz Cakiroglu (TUR) will win their Final match in the Women’s 50kg (light flyweight) category scheduled for Friday, August 9, 2024.

If Wu Yu (CHN) is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Wu”. If Buse Naz Cakiroglu (TUR) is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Cakiroglu”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after August 16, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Jill Biden speak at the DNC?
description:
The 2024 Democratic National Convention is scheduled for August 19-22, 2024.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Jill Biden is a speaker at the Democratic National Convention. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This person will be considered a "speaker" if they publicly give a speech in-person at the convention.

Brief comments, introductions, or participation in a panel or discussion do not count for a "Yes" resolution, they must actually give a speech.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Democratic party, including footage from the convention, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.description: This is a market group over who which people will speak at the Democratic National Convention (DNC) in 2024.

question: Taylor Swift cancels more tour dates in August?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Taylor Swift announces she is cancelling any more tour dates for her Eras Tour which are set between August 15 and August 31, 2024. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

For this market to resolve to "Yes" it is only necessary an announcement of a show's cancellation be made within this market's timeframe.

If all tour dates within this market's timeframe are completed and no cancellations have been made, this market will immediately resolve to "No". If a concert is delayed or rescheduled to a date beyond August 31, 2024, it will count as a cancellation and this market will resolve to "Yes".

You can find the concert dates for Taylor Swift's Eras Tour here: https://www.taylorswift.com/tour/ & https://www.taylorswift.com/tour-us/

The primary resolution source for this market is official information from Taylor Swift and/or her official representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Election certified on January 6?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the results of the 2024 U.S. Presidential election are officially certified by Congress on January 6, 2025, PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".  

Certification is defined as the official confirmation of the Electoral College results by a joint session of Congress.

The primary resolution source will be the official information from the U.S. Congress however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Jasmine Camacho-Quinn (PUR) win gold in the Women’s 100m Hurdles?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Jasmine Camacho-Quinn (PUR) wins a Gold medal in Women’s 100m Hurdles at the 2024 Summer Olympics. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.”

If this athlete is eliminated from contention for a Gold medal in this event based on the official rules of the Olympics, this market will resolve to “No.”

In case of a tie, this market will resolve in favor of the tied athlete representing USA. If no tied athlete represents USA, or if both tied athletes represent USA, this market will resolve in favor of the athlete whose last name comes first in alphabetical order.

The resolution source will be the first official results published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC).

events.title: 100m (W) Hurdles Winner

question: Will another athlete win gold in Women’s 100m Hurdles?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if any athlete other than Jasmine Camacho-Quinn (PUR), Alaysha Johnson (USA), Masai Russell (USA), Grace Stark (USA), Ackera Nugent (JAM), Nadine Visser (NED), or Devynne Charlton (BAH) wins a Gold medal in the Women’s 100m Hurdles at the 2024 Summer Olympics. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.”

In case of a tie, this market will resolve in favor of the tied athlete representing USA. If no tied athlete represents USA, or if both tied athletes represent USA, this market will resolve in favor of the athlete whose last name comes first in alphabetical order.

The resolution source will be the first official results published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC).

events.title: 100m (W) Hurdles Winner
events.description: 100m (W) Hurdles Winner

question: Will Tim Walz be D-nom for VP on Election Day?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Tim Walz is the official 2024 nominee of the Democratic Party for U.S. vice president on November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official Democratic Party sources, including https://democrats.org/.

events.title: Democratic VP nominee on election day?
events.description: This is a market on who the Democratic nominee for Vice President of the United States of America in the 2024 election will be on Election Day.

question: Will another candidate be D-nom for VP on Election Day?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any candidate other than Kamala Harris, Joe Biden, Pete Buttigieg, Gretchen Whitmer, Gavin Newsom, Michelle Obama, J.B. Pritzker, Hillary Clinton, Andy Beshear, Tim Walz, Josh Shapiro, Mark Kelly, or Gina Raimondo is the official 2024 nominee of the Democratic Party for U.S. vice president on November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official Democratic Party sources, including https://democrats.org/.
